Package provided.rmiUtils

Utilities for managing RMI plus the declarations of shared RMI-related constants.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRMI_Defs
    Definitions for use in RMI programs Note that "Client" and "Server" here do NOT refer to a client-server architecture, rather they are just identifiers to differentiate one side from the other.
    IRMIUtils
    Utility interface used to abstract and encapsulate the configuration, initialization and shutdown of RMI as well as provide utilities for accessing remote and local Registries and get the local IP address.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RMIUtils
    Concrete implementaion of the IRMIUtils, which are utilities to make it easier to start/stop the RMI system, access local/remote Registries and get the local IP address.

Package provided.rmiUtils Description

Utilities for managing RMI plus the declarations of shared RMI-related constants. Students should use the utilities defined here to perform RMI-related management operations. All system MUST utilize the constants defined here. This package also contains the "server.policy" file needed to initialize RMI's security manager.
Author:
Stephen Wong
